extension_description.message: Popular Video Downloader. Downloads most popular media formats, flash videos.

noload_message_disabled.message: Download of YouTube video is disabled!

noload_message_probably.message: Probably you may consider better extension:

noyoutube_message.message: Due to Google Webstore Policy you're unable to download.

popup_cant_find_media.message: Can't find the media for download.

popup_donate_block_message1.message: Thank you for your interest in donating! Your donation will help ensure that we can continue to make great software, and keep as much of it free as possible. How’s it free if we’re asking you to donate? That’s the great part—if you can’t afford it or you’re not sure it’s worth it, you’re welcome to keep using our software free of charge.

popup_donate_block_message2.message: Received donations will NOT be used to pay salaries or any indirect costs that is not directly related to keeping the service on the Internet.

popup_media_combine_message2.message: You need to wait until video completely preloads, then start to download.

popup_media_combine_message3.message: Otherwise, you will download only pre-loaded part.

popup_media_combine_title.message: Note! For this video you need to wait until it fully loads into your browser.

popup_media_not_found.message: Can't find the media for download.

popup_media_private.message: This video is private and can't be downloaded.

popup_noyoutube_message1.message: Due to YouTube Policy. It isn't allowed to download from YouTube.

popup_noyoutube_message2.message: Please, do not post negative reviews. This is not our fault.

popup_rate_message.message: If you like us, please rate our product.

popup_root_media.description: Title for error of supported sites
popup_root_media.message: Download feature is not accessible from site root.

popup_sniffer_notice.message: Nothing to download. Try to start playing video.

popup_sovet_block.message: Smart Pause automatically pauses currently playing videos on YouTube once you leave the page and resumes playback when you return.

popup_streams_message1.message: You need converter extension for Streams.

popup_streams_message2.message: Sorry, but this is the only way how to make it work.

popup_streams_message3.message: Streaming video will be downloaded in the folder in two files. Mostly this is audio and video. Our FREE converter will merge them into one file. That's pretty simple and won't take much time from you.

popup_update_chrome_notice.message: Your version of Google Chrome™ is out of date. Please update it to work with Stream Video Downloader.

vk_download_video_hd.description: Download link for VK Video HD
